de.polygonal.ds.mem.BitMemory

type
class
extends
MemoryAccess

A bit-vector using fast "alchemy-memory" for data storage.

Static Methods

ofByteArray(input : flash.utils.ByteArray, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : BitMemory

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a ByteMemory object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

ofBytesData(input : haxe.io.BytesData, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : BitMemory

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a ByteMemory object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

toBitVector(input : BitMemory) : de.polygonal.ds.BitVector

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input to a BitVector object.

toByteArray(input : BitMemory) : flash.utils.ByteArray

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input to a ByteArray object. The bytes are written in little endian format.

toBytesData(input : BitMemory) : haxe.io.BytesData

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input to a BytesData object. The bytes are written in little endian format.

Constructor

new(size : Int, ?name : String)

Creates a bit vector capable of storing a total of size bits.

This value should never be changed by the user.

clone() : BitMemory

Creates a deep copy of this object.

inline clr(i : Int) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Sets the bit at index i to 0.

inline clrAll() : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Sets all bits to 0.

fill(x : Int) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError x is not 0 or 1 (debug only).
Sets all bits to the value x.

free() : Void

overrides
de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess

inline get(i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Returns 1 if the bit at index i is set, otherwise zero.

inline getAddr(i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError segmentation fault (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Returns the memory byte offset for the byte storing the bit at index i.

inline has(i : Int) : Bool

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Returns true if the bit at index i is 1.

inline ofBool(i : Int, cond : Bool) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Sets the bit at index i to 1 if cond is true or clears the bit at index i if cond is false.

resize(newSize : Int) : Void

overrides
de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid size (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory was already deallocated (debug only).
Adjusts the size of this object so it's capable of storing newSize bits.

inline set(i : Int) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Sets the bit at index i to 1.

inline setAll() : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Sets all bits to 1.

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object.
Prints out all elements if compiled with the -debug directive.
Example:
	  var mem = new de.polygonal.ds.mem.BitMemory(32);
	  for (i in 0...16) {
	      mem.set(i);
	  }
	  for (i in 16...32) {
	      mem.clr(i);
	  }
	  trace(mem);
	  {BitMemory, size: 32}
	  |<
	    0 -> 11111111111111110000000000000000
	  >|
